org.springdata.cassandra.repository.support
Class SimpleCassandraRepository<T,ID extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  org.springdata.cassandra.repository.support.SimpleCassandraRepository<T,ID>
All Implemented Interfaces:
CassandraRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>
public class SimpleCassandraRepository<T,ID extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements CassandraRepository<T,ID>

Simple Repository implementation for Cassandra.

Author:
Alex Shvid
